attributes.action: ENSURE THAT ALL MP,S CLAIMS FOR EXPENCES ARE REPAID IN FULL WITH INTEREST WHEN THEY CEASE TO BE MP,S TO ALLOW THE TAXPAYER TO HAVE PROOF THAT THIS IS NOT A GRAVY TRAIN FOR TAX FREE BENEFITS FOR THE UNMENTIONABLE AND PROVE EQUALITY OF THE TAX SYSTEM FOR ALL?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS PETITION IS TO ALLOW AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE TO DEMAND FROM THE PRIME MINISTER THAT MPS PAY THEIR WAY THE SAME AS EVERY ONE ELSE WHOS TAXES ALLOW THEM TO HAVE A PRIVALIGED LIFE STYLE THAT UNTIL RECENTLY WE THE TAXPAYERS WERE UNAWARE OF! EVERYONE ELSE HAS TO ACCOUNT FOR EVERY PENNY OF THEIR EXPENCES SO WHY DO MPS EXPECT ANY PRIVALIGES!!!!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
